name: analytically

in a way that involves studying or examining things in detail, in order to discover more about them: The research is analytically rigorous/sloppy. Some people are better than others at thinking analytically. See
analytical
More examplesFewer examplesChildren as young as eight years old are being taught to approach a text analytically.All of this social media advertising is analytically based on user preferences. Analytically trained specialists using databases and sophisticated models support the marketing effort.
